courses.subject: ENGL
courses.title: Critical Methods I for English Majors

Electives courses: 15 s.h. Students must take five additional English courses (totaling 15 additional s.h.). Two of these courses (totaling 6 s.h.) can be 100-level Rowan Core English courses. One of these (3 s.h.) must be at the 300-level or higher.

notes: Total Required Credits for the Program: 18 s.h. C- is the minimum grade for each English course. The minimum overall GPA within the major is 2.0.
